bibl.title: Telegram from Philip Showalter Hench to Arthur W. Packard, November 10, 1947

div1.p: Hench requests a meeting with Packard.

div1.head: Telegram from Philip Showalter Hench to Arthur W. Packard, November 10, 1947
div1.p:
MEMO from the Desk of...
DR. P. S. HENCH
__________________________________________________
To________________________Date_______________
SUBJECT: Day letter
Secretary to Ms. Arthur W. Packard

Would it be possible for me to have
appointment with Mr. Packard
enter either Tues Nov 18 or Thursday
Nov 20. As per my letter of Oct 29.
Leaving Rochester Thursday noon for
Kentucky & east. Would appreciate
telegraphic answer
collect.

Dr Philip S Hench
Mayo clinic
Charge to the account of Dr. Philip S. Hench, Mayo Clinic $___________

WESTERN
UNION
JOSEPH L. EGAN
PRESIDENT
Send the following telegram, subject to the terms on back hereof, which are hereby agreed to

November 10, 1947 Secretary to Mr. Arthur W. Packard
49 West 49th Street
New York, New York

Would it be possible for me to have appointment with Mr. Packard either Tuesday
November 18 or Thursday, November 20, as per my letter of October 29. Leaving
Rochester Thursday noon for Kentucky and East. Would appreciate telegraphic
answer, collect.

Dr. Philip S. Hench,
Mayo Clinic
